Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'That's cool and all but I mainly just wanted to see if you'd go to the dance with me.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I notice that she's quietly mumbling to herself and pacing back and forth. But in only a few short moments she stops and looks up at me.

Name: Ares-Sama
Story: 'Very well mortal. You have peaked my interest. I shall go to the dance with you. You should feel honored!'

Name: Ares-Sama
Story: Yes! Not only do I get to keep my grade but I also get to go out with Ares-Sama. Score!
